title: Another possible solution for Ranked
body:
Currently you need level 30 with 16 champions owned for banning reasons. But let's say you implement that each of those champions needs X amount of games played? How about games WON?

Game after game I get players who either very obviously cannot play the game, cannot play the champion they are using or spout the usual "I can only play XX role or champion".

Some of them say that to get what they want, and proceed to suck ass. Some of them really cannot play anything but and their stats show that.

I want to rank up, but getting team mates who lose their lane less than 10 minutes in, or go 0/8 by the 12 minute mark, it doesn't help.

replies.body:
Guess what friend, EVERYONE gets those players. Its the people who are good, can carry that dead weight and still win games that climb.

Instead I'm sure, once someone is 0-5 you probably start calling them names and all other manner of things and get into a bad attitude about the game.

"GG this game over. Mid sucks".

Instead, think, what do we need to do in order to press our advantages? Do we split push, do we set up good wards and get a bush gank there are plenty of options open for when you have a "useless" teammate.
Yeah that time spent typing and tilting your own mid laner could be used tracking enemies as they roam or warding. Even just csing.

You know what also doesn't help?

Going junglers/top laners/ADC's that take 20 minutes to be in the game.

Not to mention the sub 20% kill contribution you have in several games (4 of your last 20 are below 20%, another 4 are below 30%).

How is it that every other lane is losing in less then 10 minutes if you can't even have 1/3 kill contribution in most of your games?
